name: compile
description: Compile a PDF document from a specific template

doc-url-expires-in.description: The doc-url-expires-in is a numerical parameter which takes integers and describes after how many seconds the provided URL is available to download the document.

latex-compiler.description: The latex-compiler parameter can take the following values:  pdflatex lualatex

latex-runs.description: The latex-runs is a numerical parameter and can take values of 1, 2 and 3.

main-file-name.description: The main-file-name is a string parameter which identifies the main file to compile.

doc-file-name.description: The doc-file-name is a string parameter which determines the name of the file. Note that the extension of the file is not required.

template-token.description: The template-token is available in your template settings after publishing your template.

body.description: Post the dynamic data for the template to compile the document PDF.
